mapper.select: SELECT portlist_category, portlist_title, portlist_content, portlist_day, portlist_url, portlist_rating FROM port_list WHERE portlist_category LIKE 'web' ORDER BY portlist_category DESC
SELECT portlist_category, portlist_title, portlist_content, portlist_day, portlist_url, portlist_rating FROM port_list WHERE portlist_category LIKE 'app' ORDER BY portlist_category DESC
SELECT portlist_category, portlist_title, portlist_content, portlist_day, portlist_url, portlist_rating FROM port_list WHERE portlist_category LIKE 'design' ORDER BY portlist_category DESC
SELECT portlist_category, portlist_title, portlist_content, portlist_day, portlist_url, portlist_rating FROM port_list WHERE portlist_category LIKE 'photo' ORDER BY portlist_category DESC
